description: Give dinner a tropical makeover by serving sweet and savoury chicken skewers with grilled pineapple slices.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Sweet Smoky BBQ Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue or griddle pan on medium-high heat and lightly grease with oil.
Cook kebabs for 15 minutes, turning occasionally, until browned all over.
Meanwhile, vent microwave rice and microwave on high for 21/2 minutes. Cook pineapple slices on flat plate of barbecue for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until golden.
Toss salad kit together in a large bowl. Place salad and rice on plates and top with pineapple and kebabs.
